thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 3 of 457
thread.title: Angela

author: Angela
title: Angela
text:
If you need a nice car, but no car lot will accept your low credit score, this is the place for you.
Low, and I mean low down payment. Best customer service I've had in years (that is important to me). They report to all three credit bureaus so you can work on repairing your score. I wasn't confident walking in, because just the night before I was Quote: d an EXTREMELY high down payment elsewhere. At Drive Time, they go by income, not credit score (include everything, i.e. child support and all). Again, do yourself a favor and just go there, trust me, I'm breathing easy now.
Thanks Nael, Alex, Brandi, and the Drive Time team!
